Argumento: The story of a long-lost book that mysteriously reappears and connects an old man searching for his son with a girl seeking a cure for her mother's loneliness.

A rock & roll romantic comedy set in NYC about the pursuit of love, passion, and the meaning of life, all punctuated by an original, pulsating soundtrack and live performances by the all girl group MaxiTit.
Tarzán, tras acostumbrarse a vivir en Londres, regresa a su hogar en la jungla para investigar las actividades mineras en la zona.
A young girl has feelings for two guys and it's time to make the choice but it might be too late.

Goa Girls is about Priya who is married to a millionaire and has an illegal affair with her PA Aravind. To lead a happy life they plan to kill Priya's husband. Twist in the tale arises when Priya herself gets killed. Finding the killer and the motive behind it forms the rest of the story.
After a missed flight, an absent-minded scientist must catch a cab to make his marriage proposal but a stern driver veers him further off-course.
A magical encounter leaves a young woman with a dog that must help her romance a pop star in order to transform back into a human.
Un artista se enamora de una joven mujer casada mientras se le encarga pintar su retrato durante la manía tulipán del siglo XVII en Ámsterdam.
Una joven se encuentra en el extremo receptor de una terrible maldición que amenaza con acabar con su vida en 7 días.
Mini drama about 2 guys that feel love one for each other, but their parents don't accept that relationship, So they decide to escape together and thus be happy for an eternity.

Rayaba, an aimless guy who fails in 12th-grade exams, falls in love with Shraddha, a state topper and the daughter of a health quality inspector. After a lot of wooing, Rayaba manages to win Shraddha's heart and when her father comes to know about their relationship he agrees for their marriage but on the condition that Rayba passes the test put by him. Whilst attempt... Leer todo

Spandan is an emotional roller coaster that has elements of laughter, joy, and tears. It showcases how in the modern day the increased usage of social networking platforms has affected the family relationships and how it has created a sense of void among the family members.

Violet Jones, cansada de esperar a que su novio de mucho tiempo le proponga matrimonio, rompe con él. Pero antiguos sentimientos, y sin duda un montón de celos, surgen cuando pronto comienza a salir con otra mujer.

Título: I Love When You Sing to Me

Argumento: An American one-hit wonder finds love in a Nigerian gospel singer.
Imagine to be part of a social experiment that every member is willing to help you.
The stunning landscape of Western Australia is the backdrop for an impassioned tale of love and grief in Gregor Jordan's adaptation of the acclaimed novel by Tim Winton.

Es Navidad en Aldovia, y todos esperan al bebé real. Amber y Richard acogen a la familia real de un lejano reino para renovar un tratado de paz, pero este desaparece y una antigua maldición amenaza la paz de la familia.
Título: Un príncipe de Navidad: Bebé real

Argumento: To protect her heart, Sophie is determined to cut ties with the womanizing man she has come to fall in love with, as she can no longer take being one of many.
A dejected man holed up in a motel room, aided by a phone sex operator, attempts reincarnating an absent lover. Ultimately blurring the lines between reality and fiction.
The separation from her first love makes Zeynep into a lonesome woman; trying to find her lost love in letters she writes to prison inmates, she is led to one sentenced to life in prison.
The relationship between a guy and a girl becomes complicated when the latter gets tired of the former's impatient behaviour.

A lonely and unsettled Sam is looking to find love every New Year's Eve with Rose the call girl. Hiding from their true identities stalls Sam's best efforts, to find out more about his affection towards Rose.
Basado en el bestseller de la autora Jodi Ellen Malpas.
Based on true events, a man makes his final promise to his love; a dying girl.
While on vacation in Japan, a Filipina actress meets a young Filipino man.
Prakash and Geethanjali meet through uncertain circumstances and over the course of a single night embark on a revelatory and lasting adventure.

New Media Comedy presents the most unusual love story of all time. Gail is human. Her new boyfriend is not. Can a woman and a ventriloquist's dummy find true love in NYC? Check out Amanda Nicholas and her co-star "Jack" as they give you a taste of the RomCom as you've never seen it before!
When Englands best spy and Spains best counterspy fall in love, loyalty to each other will be tested against their loyalty to their governments.
After graduating high school, Quinn realizes he has one last chance to tell his long-time crush, Audrey, how he really feels.
Two musician lovers dream of composing a melody that will move the world.

Fayia is a 16-year-old Liberian refugee living on his own in a United Nations camp set up in Sierra Leone. A child of the wars in both countries, he is a survivor, making a life for himself by harvesting palm wine from the jungle to sell in the nearby city. But he's also just a teenager, looking for love and answers to some of life's big questions. A hybrid film proje... Leer todo

THIRSTY tells the story of a mosquito who falls in love with a man after she tastes his blood. Through her eyes we explore the ups and downs of sex, intimacy, love, and a bug's unflinching desire to feel human.
Maril, a lonely woman, decides to travel to the end of the world to recover from a recent loss.
Mahtab and Ava are classmates in their second year of college studying engineering. The story begin when they and other classmates go on a trip to Esfahan.
Un caballero medieval inglés es mágicamente transportado al presente, donde se enamora de una profesora de ciencias que no cree en el amor.

Robot Trash is a sci-fi romance, questioning the meaning of fidelity in the age of AI/Robots, set in the not-so-distant future. The story follows Dale and Claudette, power couple and embracers of the robot revolution, as they reach an impasse when their robot, Io comes between their marriage.

Kate McCarthy, a former teen sitcom star who trashed her life through drug abuse, is forced to live, fresh out of rehab, on the one remaining piece of property, her business manager, Charlie has kept out of foreclosure - a run-down apartment building in east L.A. With her one remaining trendy friend, Claire, who's still an addict and trapped in a loveless marriage, th... Leer todo
Una madre cae en una adictiva relación con un diplomático ruso con el que no tiene nada en común.

....is a narrative that takes place over the life span of a married couple, their adorable love story starting from how they meet as youths, become friends, their courtship, their marriage and the difficulties they encounter.. they can't imagine their lives without each other until the hiccups and road bumps life throws at them. they struggle to get through the rough ... Leer todo
Dos individuos en un viaje de amor, pérdida y vida a través de las fases de la reencarnación.
En 1998, Isabel es una estudiante de periodismo en prácticas en Galicia que encuentra un obituario anónimo dedicado a Lucía, una historia de amor, amistad y traición que nos remonta a 1958.

Cuando la trabajadora humanitaria británica Hana regresa a la antigua ciudad de Luxor, se encuentra con su ex amante Sultan. Ella lucha por reconciliar las elecciones del pasado con la incertidumbre del presente.

A tragic, yet inspiring love story between a young actress and young filmmaker, whose relationship blurs the line between what transpires within the movie screen versus in reality, pushing their artistic endeavor to the brink as they try to create something worthwhile together.
It follows Pat Reyes who is a hardworking hostel manager and online vegetable seller who trains her boss' hardheaded and exiled grandson as a hostel employee.
Allan and Ellen are living a serious crisis in their life after many years together. Through their subconscious they will travel together to a desert with the intention of recovering their lost love.
Music is the language of the human soul.
In a love triangle that miraculously mirrors her mother's romance years ago, a young woman lets her heart lead.

In the 1990s, the two girls and a boy who first entered the society tested the incredible destiny they experienced in the pursuit of a new life. In the flourishing 1990s, they rose up with the dream and they survived.

Título: What Men Don't Know About Women

Argumento: Berlín-Kreuzberg es el microcosmos de Nora. Nora, la observadora silenciosa, que nos acompaña en fiestas, en la escuela, en la piscina, en los tejados y en los apartamentos, presenciando eventos que se desvanecen en la luz del verano.

A nobleman poet embarks on a boat trip with two local fishermen. As they hop the bucolic islands, he recalls his youthful tragic love and his artistic impotence while the uneasy relationship with common fishermen evolves..

Maravairi accentuates queer pride and celebrates Diversity and Inclusiveness. We embrace the bold legacy of LGBTQ while attempting a conceptual divergence from usual portrayal of Indian Classical Music.
After a failed attempt to reconnect, a gamer's frustrated wife decides to build him a game of her own with real-life stakes.
After being gone for eleven years, a burnt out hardcore vocalist returns to his small, New Jersey hometown, in the wake of his father's death during the holidays.
This is the story of a young, immigrant couple, whose love is tested by real life struggles and challenges on a foreign soil.
A story of a young man running from the truth about his childhood returns in order to correct his past but ends up discovering a side of himself that he suppressed.
Marco cuts class to spend the afternoon with his boyfriend, Graham. Things do not go as planned.
Los amores de cuatro escolares: un romántico, un pragmático, un cabeza hueca y un lotario.
A broken couple inevitably question the meaning of their relationship while on a drive.

Claudia, de dieciséis años, creció aislada del mundo. Encerrada en una propiedad remota después de la muerte de su madre, se sorprende cuando Grace, una animada adolescente local, aparece en el jardín como un soplo de aire fresco.
Después de quedarse en el altar, el padrino de boda de Pete le dio un regalo de bodas que nunca olvidará.

Varios relatos de las personas que trabajan en bodas para crear el día perfecto para una pareja amorosa, mientras que sus propias relaciones son extravagantes, extrañas, locas y lejos de ser perfectas.

Para vengarse de una familia rica, un hombre se hace pasar por millonario para pedir la mano de su hija. Cuando su trama es descubierta, finge tener un hermano gemelo, y así las mentiras se empiezan a amontonar.
Despite the 20 years between them, they are in love; even after their split, their love endures.
When an impassioned couple returns from a date, a series of surreal happenings prevents them from reaching the bedroom.

An anniversary nears for isolated caregiver and failed artist Alice Briggs: her ten year curse. Escaping it in drink, dance, and dangerous letter writing, a guest threatens her Devil's Tail world. Click "External sites" official trailer.
Joe and Connie's awkward blind date takes an interesting turn when they discover that they share the same magical ability.
El camino hacia un final feliz para Kartik y Aman es rocoso. La familia de Aman intenta romper su amor por Kartik, pero este no se dará por vencido hasta casarse con su chico.
A hoichoi original short about a lonely young woman facing harassment and bullying. Will an invisible friend help her? Watch the new Bengali movie on hoichoi.
Un chico torpe se ve obligado a salir de su caparazón cuando su némesis de la escuela regresa a la ciudad e intenta robar a su novia.
El niño rico está decidido a demostrarle su valía a Paula, su pareja. Pero cuando le dice que creció pobre, la mentira se descontrola.
En 1987, cuando la ley marcial llega a su fin en Taiwan, Jia-han y Birdy se enamoran rodeados de presiones familiares, homofobia y estigma social.

Un médium espiritista sostiene una sesión para un escritor que sufre de bloqueo, pero accidentalmente invoca el espíritu de su primera esposa fallecida, lo que lleva a un triángulo amoroso cada vez más complejo con su actual esposa.

Travis, a 20-something, spends his days and nights hooking up with women off a dating app. During one such encounter he discovers a songwriting savant and they start a band, which causes problems for their burgeoning romantic relationship.
Un bartender conoce a la mujer de sus sueños, a través de una serie de coincidencias. Los dos se encuentran para una cita, una velada romántica perfecta por el momento.
Secuela de la película "After", basada en el libro del mismo nombre.

Irma, Eugenia, Miranda and Rina are four different women, each with their character, their weaknesses and their eccentricities, but linked by a deep and lasting knowledge over time, united and marked by their indispensable games. cards.

Izumi and Alex go about their mundane existences while quietly refusing to give into mandates of the new dystopian society - namely undergoing a surgical treatment that renders the brain incapable of dreaming.
Tras conocerse online, los amantes transatlánticos Aviva y Eden se embarcan en un cortejo tumultuoso, una historia de amor, un matrimonio, una separación y un intento de reunión.
Cinco historias sobre temas de mujeres, vagamente conectadas y con un elemento erótico.
While he recovers from a bad injury, a baseball player meets again his former love and starts to believe that something is still there that can change their lives.
Título: Romance in the Outfield: Double Play

Argumento: Two young adults try to manage their complicated feelings in the midst of a passionate but ultimately doomed romance.
After losing the love of his life a young man kills himself and is then reincarnated as a bridge for 100 years.
An unforgettable love that overcomes all obstacles, even time, distance and falling apart.
A story about love and betrayal.
My body . his drugs ,his lies , is all from the person I love , I feel like dying everyday .
After decades of making space for others, an East Asian grandmother finally begins to explore her romantic and sexual self.
A group of old friends get together to be with their beloved aunt/grandmother who took care of them when they were kids for her last days. And things get complicated.
A love story, chronicling the life of an Irish woman marrying a black professional boxer in Britain during the early 1950's, and the joys and challenges they faced together.
In the high school basketball team, Gaby is indisputable holder and Juliette her eternal substitute, until the day when their rivalry takes them to a new playground.
A coming of age story centered on the curious Indiyah as she navigates love and lust with the help of her closest friends, the distant guidance of her mother, and her infatuation with art.

Un joven de 16 años en la costa de Normandía en los 80 no sueña ni con un mejor amigo, ni con un pacto adolescente, ni con aventuras de verano en moto o en barco, sino con la muerte. De vacaciones, Alexis comienza a conocerse a sí mismo.

Present Still Perfect is the sequel to its first chapter when "Toey" fall in love with "Oat", the cool guy who was about to get married. That journey had been hurting "Toey" and caused him so many questions. Four years later, he accidentally met Oat at the airport. All the pains came back to him once again. As a result, he decided to go rest his heart at "Koh Kood", T... Leer todo
A World of Luxury and Dreams. Reality, but fantasy. In this world, everything is high-fashion and elegance on the surface, but, underneath it, there's accumulation of failure and heartbreak.

Learning to love again is a challenging task, and even more challenging when running your own business. Will the past of Ashley Valentine cause her to miss out on love? Or will she recognize the love that's been there all along?
Two boys spend one last night together in Brooklyn.
Título: Who Can Predict What Will Move You

Argumento: Ren Takahashi and Aoi Sonoda are both children of the 1980s having been born in 1989. They met in 2002 and got to know love and lust at that young age through each other. As it so often happens at that age they went their separate ways only to reunite at the age of twenty one. Fate repeated itself. They are thirty-one years old and meeting again. What will be differen... Leer todo
Three years after accidentally killing her husband, a motel receptionist falls in love with a handsome guest.
Grace and James, an indie punk rock duo from Canada have big plans for their upcoming album, but even bigger news is on the way.

The Lion Rock is a movie rich with nostalgia, sweetness, drama and comedy. The main character Saro, is a 10 year old boy who lives in a small fishing village named Santa Maria La Scala in Sicily (Italy). Saro has a secret friend, a sea-rock. It is here where Saro ventures at night, pulled by the sound of the crashing waves and pale moon reflecting off the clear water.... Leer todo
Eugenia, 30, is torn between fulfilling or not a promise made 13 years ago to Luis, his brief and tragic teen love.

Paul es un fotógrafo que se reencuentra con su primer amor, Anna, en un ruidoso mercado de Filipinas. Aunque la llama se prende de nuevo, sus principios son conflictivos. La noche que comparten lo cambiará todo.

One successful writer, one eccentric Wall Streeter, one feeling ex con turned businessman, a witty literary agent and a sensitive woman - all of a certain age and then some -- try to figure out this thing called love.
A heartbroken documentary filmmaker focuses his camera on interesting women with hopes of finding enlightenment and love.

Günfer, who has big dreams in her small town, turns her life upside down with successive disasters. Günfer loses her father, whom she calls "my hero", from cancer. Without getting over the shock of this sudden death, this time because of her uncle's gambling debt, the mafia busted her father's bakery.
En el corazón de Ghana, una familia criminal tiene que arreglar su conducta antes de que el gobierno cierre su salón privado.
an "anti-romantic comedy" in Berlin.

Vicki idolizes her new girlfriend Samantha, but draws the line when it comes to her time on the porcelain throne. Their small bathroom gets awkward when Samatha challenges Vicki's definition of intimacy.
Casablanca's beach, Morocco. Teenager's desire for each other is growing discreetly. Adults and children oversee. A fight creates a diversion.
Matvey Polyakov, un joven de 18 años con un corazón puro, conoce a un grupo de carteristas y se entrena para aprender a robar.
Special agents undercover Ace and Sandy face an unexpected situation in Maximum City as they try to get a job done against a crime organization.
Aathi is a quiet henchman for a tough boss of the Paris Tamil mafia. When he meets Minnale, a young immigrant with nowhere to go, he begins to question his loyalty.
Sigue a la testaruda Ginny que conoce a Sunny para un matrimonio arreglado, pero lo rechaza, y luego muestra cómo Sunny se une a la madre de Ginny para ganarse su amor.

Five Ivory Hearts is set in the 1950s and tells the love story of three people. Steve, who has lost his father and his way. Julianne, a wannabe actress, just searching for a place to belong. And Ginger, a nice, warm, kind-heart waitress who has dreams of living in Paris.Sometimes you survive love, but sometimes love doesn't survive lust.
Britni thinks she's going on a totally normal first date with Stryker, but unfortunately the date includes a few others.
Esther, a composer going through a dry spell, finds an inspiration in an unusual and possibly dangerous Muse.
Dennis is searching for human connection despite having a head that looks like a literal bag of money.
Two people wake up in a bed together. Alvin was drunk of out his mind and doesn't remember a thing. Latifa doesn't drink and remembers everything.

Lolle's love life in Berlin is as complicated as ever. After the story with Sven, her second cousin, was over, she got together with her best friend Hart and the two are about to get married. That is, if Sven doesn't ruin things.
Título: Berlin, Berlin: la novia se fuga
Alessandra - Un grande amore e niente più

Argumento: Raaj and Jessie , A newly married happy couple settled in a Private luxury house, Encounter unnatural and unbelievable situations followed by series of trouble emotionally, physically and mentally .The protagonist Raaj challenges the situations and gets his share of Revenge .
After fleeing Earth in the late 80s, an alien returns to his childhood home in search of his best friend. As he gets closer to finding her, his mysterious past gets closer to catching him.
A dying woman recounts the story of her forbidden love affair with a girl in Catholic school.

A producer afflicted with a debilitating curse can only be cured by the reporter who despises him. Ths story is a modern day Beauty and the Beast or "When Harry Met Sally" watching "The X Files" in jail.

A theatre company unravels when its director casts his two lead actors, both working to save their broken marriage, in a self-indulgent play that makes them recreate the director's own recently-failed relationship.
Título: It Plays Like Love: Restaged Edition

Argumento: After a dreadful break-up, a strikingly cultured student stuck in the small town of Potchefstroom, packs her bags for the adventure and bright lights of London. She falls head over heels in love with a handsome, barefoot Namibian, but allows her fears to get the better of her. When he knocks on her door years later, with promises of horizons and a life together, she c... Leer todo
A musical film about human relationships and how today's working life and the pressures of our surroundings can lead a person to the point of exhaustion.
When an incredible love story of two people meets the everyday life.

Tristan (Reza Rahadian) is the owner of the shop that buys and sells ex-lover items for people who want to move on. Suddenly, Laras (Marsha Timothy), his ex-lover, comes and makes his life turned upside down.
Nagata is the director of a theater troupe. Unfortunately, he is rather unsuccessful on his finances which makes the crew has little confidence in him.
Sé testigo de la búsqueda de una mujer, para unirse a su amante desaparecido, cruzando a una dimensión paralela.
Four couples are gathered for a Premarital counseling class in which they address their problems to a dysfunctional counselor. They must get it together or forget it forever.
Una bailarina clásica descubre el hip-hop por casualidad y se enfrenta a una elección imposible: perseguir el legado familiar, o su nueva pasión.
Título: Into the Beat - Tu corazón baila

Argumento: Yashiro is the president of the Shinseikai Enterprise. He leads a double life as a deviant and a masochist. Doumeki Chikara comes to work as a bodyguard for Yashiro. They begin an affair of two men with songs in their hearts.
Título: Saezuru Tori Wa Habatakanai: The Clouds Gather

Argumento: Princess Ellena whom awakes to the same day over and over has to overcome an old spell which threatens to destroy the kingdom and defeat the evil witch.
Para Hampus es un alivio romper con su destructiva relación, mientras que Adrian está devastado. ¿Podrá sobrevivir sin el amor de su vida, o hay alguna forma de recuperarlo?
Two male actors are drawn to each other. Can they work things out?
A unique relationship flourishes between an aspiring artist and a plant man growing in his garden.

After a happenstance meeting, Tristan and Isaac fall deeply in love, forming a seemingly impermeable romance. But when reality becomes unavoidable, all truths must be faced. Loosely inspired by the classic love tragedy Tristan and Isolde.

Life does not go well the last couple of years for film director Serge Gabriëls. Since the day he chose his career above the woman of his life, things kept going downhill. When a bailiff was sent to declare his production company bankrupt, he lost all hope and perspective. Fortunately at that crucial moment he received the one phone call he has been waiting for his wh... Leer todo

Amelia Ripley has it all, the perfect life, the perfect husband, the perfect job as a freelance writer but when her husband, Liam Ripley, becomes more and more jealous of her best friend, Noah, things take a turn for the worst.

Shun and Nagisa first meet and fall in love during high school. However, despite strong feelings, they go their separate ways. Years later, Shun is now living alone in a rural area when Nagisa arrives with his six-year-old daughter, Sora.

Ana es una influencer adicta a las redes sociales. Un día sufre un accidente automovilísitico porque estaba usando su teléfono móvil mientras conducía. La envían a una casa alejada de la ciudad con su abuelo y sin conexión a Internet.
A video doorbell spies on a new couple across the hall as their relationship takes a dark turn.

A dimension-shifting mime player is disturbed in his peace by a student fraternity. His response is unexpected: by using the fourth wall, he turns their world on its head; literally. However, his powers are useless to achieve romance.
